item.name: Golden ankh
item.description: Adds 500 health and 8 armor.\nIt restores the health of the owner by 10 every second as long as it remains below 25%

item.name: Fur gloves of health
item.description: They add 1200 health.\nIf used, they restore the health of a nearby ally by taking it from the owner

item.name: Amulet of triumph
item.description: Restores the health of the owner by 100 upon every kill, with a 50% chance to restore 50 more health
